1. Inverted throttle cut

Like pressing X, but instead of bringing the throttle all the way down to 0, bring the throttle all the way up to maximum.

2. Action group fuel tank controls

Have options for fuel tanks in the action group menu to enable/disable flow of liquid fuel/oxidizer.

3. Longer/taller probe tanks

Like the Orange Rockomax Jumbo-64 or the FL-T800, but in a probe form factor.

4. Probe-sized RCS thrusters

Self-explanatory

5. Radial Fuel tanks

Fuel tanks that are like the Stratus RCS tanks or the PB-X50R Xenon tanks.

6. Sensor readout window

Instead of having to right-click on an accelerometer/barometer/gravity meter/thermometer, have a window like the debug menu that shows the data coming from them and buttons to enable/disable the sensors.

7. Girder Adapters

We already have an adapter to go from the big girders to the medium tanks. What i'm thinking of is adapters to go from the small girders to probe pieces, from small girders to big girders, from big girders to probe pieces, etc...

8. Radial drogue chutes

Self-explanatory.

9. More decoupler sizes

The decouplers we have now look huge on probe parts and medium-sized parts.

10. Inline parachutes

Make parachute parts that can have things stacked on the top and bottom of them. Maybe have the chutes come out of ports on the side.
